reviewText:
I enjoyed Nora Ephron very much. From written word to her movies.
This DVD was a delight, because it featured Nora in different interviews with Charlie Rose.
You get to hear and see her, not just listen to biographic information from a third party.
Do buy it! Would make a nice gift. -- Joe
I love this DVD great memories of Nora Ephron a must have if you are a Nora Ephron fan nice interviews going back to 1992 to 2010
